title: Vaishnavi Emerald & Diamond Long Haaram - A Regal Statement Piece
materials: featuring brilliant-cut Diamonds and Emeralds (పచ్చ). Diamonds are VS clarity and G color. Gold weight is approximately 80 grams.
features: Intricate design with peacock motifs, a symbol of beauty and prosperity. The central pendant showcases a traditional Indian design with a central Emerald surrounded by pave-set diamonds. The long chain features a recurring diamond and emerald pattern. Features elements of Nakshi work throughout, showcasing a rich heritage.
colors: accentuated by the rich green hue of the Emeralds. The warm gold tones complement the cool vibrancy of the Emeralds
creating a classic and elegant South Indian color palette.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings (పెళ్ళి)
and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for high-end galas and formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: A timeless piece of South Indian heritage, crafted with exceptional skill and the highest quality materials. The long Haaram design is a symbol of tradition and elegance. The Emeralds are carefully selected for their vibrant color and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant shine. This piece is an investment in beauty and cultural value.
